meaning_str.bing:
adj. 感激的；表示感谢的；请
网络. 感恩的；可喜的

感激的；感谢的；（尤用于书信或正式场合提出请求）感激不尽；请；感恩的；欣慰的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；受欢迎的；令人赏心悦目的

1.en: I would be grateful if you could investigate the matter as soon as possible. And I am looking forward to an early reply.
1.cn: 如能尽快调查此事件，我将不胜感激。我期待着您及时地恢复。

2.en: Every time I receive my gift, no matter how much, my friend Bill (Bill) will never forget the grateful.
2.cn: 每次收到我的礼物，不管多少，我的朋友比尔（Bill）决不忘记表示感激。

3.en: I'd be grateful if you could let me know in advance if you don't want a meal or if you're going to be late for any reason.
3.cn: 如果你不想吃饭或是由于某种原因可能回来晚一些，请提前告诉我，我会很感谢的。

0.en: The grateful looks in everyone's faces will be pay enough for me.
0.cn: 大家脸上感激的表情就是对我们最好的回报了。

1.en: I was grateful for the call. You were grateful? Yeah.
1.cn: 谢谢你打给我。谢我吗？是啊。

2.en: I am grateful for the honor, Khagan.

3.en: You saved our lives. We are eternally grateful.
3.cn: 你救了我们，我们这辈子都感激不尽。

4.en: I'm grateful to them though, they brought you here.
4.cn: 但我感激他们，他们把你引来了这里。

5.en: Finally we're here, and the world should be grateful.
5.cn: 终于，我们到了，全世界应该感谢我们。

6.en: I'm very grateful, My Lady. I know you didn't have to do this.
6.cn: 我很感激，小姐，我知道您不必这样。

7.en: And I'm so grateful that so many women around the world connected to it.
7.cn: 世界上很多女性都同它产生了共鸣，这让我很欣慰。

8.en: The king is very grateful that you traveled all this way for his wedding.
8.cn: 国王非常感激您远道而来参加他的婚礼。

9.en: And if that's all I ever get, then it's a lovely life and I'm grateful for it.
9.cn: 如果他们是我人生的全部，那我的生活真的很美好，我很感激。

10.en: You should be grateful, Wade. You won't be around to endure my maniacal reign.
10.cn: 你应该感恩，韦德。你可撑不到我疯狂统治的那一天。

11.en: You will always be a child of two worlds. I am grateful for this, and for you.
11.cn: 你永远都是两个世界的孩子，我为此感到感激，也为你。

12.en: A bespoke suit always fits. Just be grateful Harry had it made for you. Get dressed.
12.cn: 这是为你量身定做的。感谢哈利吧，他给你定做的，穿上吧。

13.en: Grateful for his regard, I responded to his appeal and threw myself into his service.
13.cn: 由是感激，遂许先帝以驱驰。

14.en: Heroes gradually lowered the quality season by season till we were grateful it ended.
14.cn: 《英雄》的剧情一季比一季烂，到结尾时，观众还感到庆幸呢。

15.en: I went to bed that night feeling peaceful. I was grateful that I had the family I had.
15.cn: 我入睡的时候，感觉很平和，我很庆幸，有现在这样的家庭。

16.en: Well done for rounding them all up. I'm very grateful. Don't be. I'm as keen as you are.
16.cn: 多谢你把他们都叫来了，谢谢。没事，我跟你一样期待呢。

17.en: Minister, how kind of you to find time for us in your busy schedule. We're very grateful.
17.cn: 大臣先生，多谢您百忙中抽出时间来见我们，我们很感激。

18.en: Serena is so grateful because she likes to see the best in people. I like to see the truth.
18.cn: 瑟琳娜很感谢你，因为她只看到人们好的一面，我想知道真相。

19.en: So, I am grateful to each and every one of you for coming out and showing your support today.
19.cn: 所以我很感激你们每个人今天前来表示对我的支持。
